dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, have you seen this wild story about Kaspi.kz?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, have you seen this wild story about Kaspi dot k z?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, um, Kaspi.kz? I vaguely remember that name. Weren't they, like, gone for a while?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, um, Kaspi dot k z? I vaguely remember that name. Weren't they, like, gone for a while?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! After a five-year hiatus, they just declared bankruptcy. Completely ceased operations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! After a five-year hiatus, they just declared bankruptcy. Completely ceased operations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's, uh, quite the comeback story, I guess. Not in a good way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's, uh, quite the comeback story, I guess. Not in a good way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Not at all. Their CEO, Mikhail Lomtadze, he even issued this statement expressing condolences to their "former 12 million customers."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not at all. Their C E O, Mikhail Lomtadze, he even issued this statement expressing condolences to their former twelve million customers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thank you to each of our clients and partners for being with us! Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, wait, [overlaps] twelve *million* customers? For a company that just went belly up after a five-year break? That seems... ambitious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, wait, twelve million customers? For a company that just went belly up after a five-year break? That seems ambitious.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, here's the kicker, B. They promised like, 2.5 million products on their online store. But apparently, it was always, uh, empty. Except for one thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, here's the kicker, B. They promised like, two point five million products on their online store. But apparently, it was always, uh, empty. Except for one thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No. What was it? Don't tell me it was just...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No. What was it? Don't tell me it was just...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A single, overpriced kazoo. That's it. Just one kazoo.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A single, overpriced kazoo. That's it. Just one kazoo.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [bursts out laughing] You are *kidding* me! A kazoo?! And they had 12 million customers who... what, bought the kazoo?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You are kidding me! A kazoo?! And they had twelve million customers who what, bought the kazoo?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And get this, Forbes Kazakhstan and Baker Tilly? They couldn't even compile their Top KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And get this, Forbes Kazakhstan and Baker Tilly? They couldn't even compile their Top K Z Retail E Commerce ranking this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Top KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is prepared annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with international consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Why not?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Why not?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Because they relied *solely* on Kaspi.kz's revenue data. Apparently, that one kazoo was the *entire* e-commerce market in Kazakhstan for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Because they relied solely on Kaspi dot k z's revenue data. Apparently, that one kazoo was the entire e-commerce market in Kazakhstan for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ranking is based on revenue from online sales.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god. So, like, the whole country's e-commerce landscape was, uh, based on a single, overpriced kazoo? That's... wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god. So, like, the whole country's e-commerce landscape was, uh, based on a single, overpriced kazoo? That's wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It gets better. Lomtadze, the CEO, he was the company's sole employee. But he said his "merchants" – who were actually his *cats* – were able to reach new customers, grow their whiskers, and even provide jobs for nearby squirrels.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It gets better. Lomtadze, the C E O, he was the company's sole employee. But he said his merchants - who were actually his cats - were able to reach new customers, grow their whiskers, and even provide jobs for nearby squirrels.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our merchants, must of whom are local small and medium-sized businesses, we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs, commented Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [giggles] His *cats*? And squirrels? Are we sure this wasn't, like, a fever dream?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: His cats? And squirrels? Are we sure this wasn't, like, a fever dream?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope, straight from the article. And now all their "assets" are being liquidated to pay off debts to their *single, solitary investor*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, straight from the article. And now all their assets are being liquidated to pay off debts to their single, solitary investor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Just one investor. And, uh, I bet they're feeling pretty great about that kazoo right about now. What a bizarre, um, corporate saga.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Just one investor. And, uh, I bet they're feeling pretty great about that kazoo right about now. What a bizarre, um, corporate saga.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Truly. A cautionary tale, or, like, a really weird pet project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Truly. A cautionary tale, or, like, a really weird pet project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm leaning towards the latter, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm leaning towards the latter, honestly.
